snapUpload.title: Snap & Upload
snapUpload.description: Take photos of textbooks, notes, or upload PDFs and documents. Our AI extracts all the important content.

flashcards.title: AI-Generated Flashcards

topics.description: Automatically group content into topics. Set priorities to focus on what matters most.

plans.description: Get personalized daily study tasks based on your target date and topic priorities.
